name: safeline
description: SafeLine is a self-hosted security platform that detects web application attacks using AI. It includes dashboards, threat intelligence, and supports scalable deployment.

features.title: Ai
features.description: Uses machine learning to identify web application attacks and zero-day threats

features.title: Web Application Firewall
features.description: Protects against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities including SQL injection and XSS

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Displays live traffic analysis and threat detection in comprehensive dashboards

features.title: Threat Intelligence
features.description: Integrates global threat feeds to block known malicious IPs and attack patterns

features.title: Custom Rules
features.description: Create and deploy custom security rules tailored to your application's needs

features.title: Attack Visualization
features.description: Provides detailed attack timelines and geographic distribution maps

features.title: REST API
features.description: Secures REST and GraphQL APIs with rate limiting and input validation

features.title: Ssl/tls Termination
features.description: Handles HTTPS traffic with automatic certificate management
